/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The buildings lining the street are painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars and people can be seen going about their day, contributing to the dynamic atmosphere of the city. Power lines crisscross above, a common sight in many urban areas. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the details and colors of the scene.
